title: MPH: Last-placed Alpine could fight for wins in 2026. Two corners show why
summary: Alpine sits at the bottom of the F1 championship table this year; its drivers struggling with the car. But one change due in 2026 could transform its fortunes, saysMark Hughes

qa_pairs.question: Which team is currently at the bottom of the F1 championship table?
What significant change is expected to potentially improve Alpine's performance in 2026?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: A car redesign or technical regulation change

qa_pairs.question: In Formula 1, what is often the main factor that affects a team's performance in a season?
